post:
Dimension Servers offers affordable advertisement free web shared hosting solutions,

reseller accounts, Virtuozzo based VPS's and domain names. Our reliable hosting solutions

and friendly technical support personal, makes us the perfect place to host your web

project. We boast a proven 99.95% uptime guarantee, 24x7x365 technical support services, and

daily off site backups.

Our companies innovative products are founded upon quality top of the line internet

architectures. Approaching our third year in business we promise to make the most of 2007 by

continuing with our innovative and reliable web solutions.

We offer cutting edge servers & hosting services geared towards the web developer community.

We have top notch 24×7x365 technical support services, and our developer friendly

environment includes PHP4, PHP5, Ruby on Rails (mongrel based), Customer requested add-ons,

99.95% Uptime, and dedicated Ruby on Rails Staff to help get you up and running quickly. We

also offer an exclusive CPanel Rails plug-in to streamline the rails application deployment

process. COME SEE THIS EXCLUSIVE FEATURE IN ACTION!


<<---------------------------------------------------------------------<<
Why Choose Dimension Servers
<<---------------------------------------------------------------------<<

* Customer Centric Hosting
* Proven network reliability (99.95% Up-Time)
* Innovation in quality products, keeps us at the cutting edge of hosting technologies.
* 100% Customer satisfaction guarantee!
* 100% Guaranteed resources! NEVER OVERSOLD!
* Friendly 24x7x365 Technical support

<<---------------------------------------------------------------------<<
What sort of technology do we use?
<<---------------------------------------------------------------------<<

* Softlayer Network & Dallas4Colo Backbone & Infrastructures
* Intel Dual XEON Quad Processor Servers
* CPanel 10/11 and WHM
* Daily off-site backups
* MySQL, Perl, SSI, PHP4, PHP5, Ruby on Rails, ImageMagick, GD and more!

<<---------------------------------------------------------------------<<

What payment methods do we accept?
<<---------------------------------------------------------------------<<

We are proud to utilize Authorize. Net’s payment gateway as our main mode for accepting

credit cards. All transactions are processed through 256bit encrypted SSL, guaranteeing 100%

transaction security. We are also proud to accept PayPal payments. We are a verified by

PayPal premium business member!

* Visa
* MasterCard
* American Express
* Discover Card
* PayPal
* Purchase Orders
* Mail-In Payments
